comment._content: What was so Electric about it? Maybe the usage of Electric was used as more the verb and not the actual noun of the word at that time?

comment.author: 74471476@N08
comment._content:
According to the ANB, Mrs Galt was "the first woman in Washington to own an electric car," which she "proudly drove" around the capital.  Prior to her marriage to WW in 1915, she was widowed and a successful manager of the wealth she inherited.
Susan Barsy

comment.author: 46317563@N04
comment._content: That's what so electric about it.
